RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISCHIEF JOKE showed good speed, vied in the two path on the turn, took the lead inside the seven-sixteenths pole, moved clear at the five-sixteenths pole, responded well when shaken up lightly in upper stretch, was kept to the task under a mild hand-ride while drifting out some until inside the furlong marker then was eased up while much the best. PERLIANO was hustled from the start, chased the pace, saved ground on the turn and earned the place. OFFICER DERICK broke out some at the start, showed speed on the outside, vied in the four path on the turn, lost touch with the winner late on that bend and weakened. FRATELLINO stumbled at the start but broke with the field, was urged along at the rear, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. MAMA'S DREAM moved up after the start and showed speed, dropped back late on the backstretch, fell further back in the three path on the turn and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Fratellino
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start,urged along,inside turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Perliano
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,speed,chased,inside turn,no match,clear for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief Joke
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Parkland Thoroughbreds Fowler Barry and Carlesimo Angelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace,ins foe,2p turn,clear5/16,drew off,eased up,much best

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,dropped back 1/2,3path turn,empty,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Officer Derick
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out some,speed outside,4path turn,drop back5/16,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 107. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRIC E OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEST ACTOR established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, got set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. SHERIFF BIANCO coaxed from the gate, chased three wide down the backstretch before tucking along the inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to secure the place honors. UNCLE MOONLIGHT chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. BABY YODA broke in at the start trading a bump with BOLD ENDEAVOR, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide for home, weakened in the stretch. BOLD ENDEAVOR broke out at the start trading a bump with BABY YODA, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. KINETIC SKY coaxed from the start, chased four to five wide down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn placed to coaxing midway, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Endeavor
ENTRY.OWNER: Winning Move Stable and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Yoda
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable Barber Gary and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Best Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, set down ins 1/4, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: E. H. Beau Lane, Gail McMichael Lane,J. B. Lane Orem & Mic

ENTRY.NAME: Sheriff Bianco
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Kinetic Sky
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan Tanzman David and Speranza Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 3w 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 99. Starter Allowance Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $25,000 OR LESS IN 2023. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOKIN AT ROSES was hustled from the gate, went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused near the seven-sixteenths, went three then four wide on the far turn, gained passing the five-sixteenths, took the lead in the five path into upper stretch, shook off foes into the final sixteenth and just held off the runner-up under steady urging. CUT THE CORD bumped with a rival at the start then was hustled, went two then three wide going around the opening bend, tracked the pace on the outside, was asked while three then two wide on the far turn, swung six wide into upper stretch, pursued the vanguard on the far outside, gained in the final sixteenth and just missed. MYSTIC NIGHT bumped with a rival at the start, went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused four then three wide on the far turn, made a bid in the four path into the stretch, battled with foes to near the sixteenth-pole then was outfinished. PORTOS broke out at the start, saved ground on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was urged while moving from three to five wide on the far turn, dropped inward in upper stretch and failed to threaten. CLASSIC MARK was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, angled out while hustled early then rushed up on the outside, took the lead in the five path leaving the opening straightaway, dropped from the four path to the two path while moving clear on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked in the two path on the far turn, lost the advantage in the three path into upper stretch and weakened. HIGHER QUALITY was fractious in the post parade, went around the turns in the two path and failed to threaten. DATESFREEDOM was hustled from the start, saved ground while well placed just off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Portos
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,ins1st,towards rear,3-5w2nd turn,mvd in,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Datesfreedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well placed inside,empty after 5/8,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious post parade,2path turns,failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,angled out,rushed up,4-2p1st,pace,2p2nd,headed3/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin At Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,3p1st,settled,ask7/16,3-4p2nd,bid5p1/4,lead3/16,clr,held

ENTRY.NAME: Cut the Cord
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,hustled,2-3p1st,trckd out,ask3-2p2nd,6p1/4,chsd,gained

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,4w1st,settled outside,4-3p2nd,bid 4p1/4,outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 110. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRIC E OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUKE OF HAZZARD (FR) tracked the pace along the inside, got let out swinging two to three wide into upper stretch, angled in to the two path just outside the eighth pole finding a seam to rally on through, seized command nearing the sixteenth marker, then dug in gamely to fend off the runner up. KURAMATA (IRE) tracked the pace two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive to be along willingly for the place honors. CALL ME HARRY forwardly placed just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, got set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the show honors. WINFROMWITHIN coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, got let out spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat from a host of pursuers and was collared nearing the sixteenth pole, then kept on to the finish. MAIN EVENT just off the inside tracking from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. TUT'S REVENGE tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. CAZADERO saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, trailed throughout. Please note due to a timing issue, the half mile, the three quarters and the seven-eighths splits were hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Cazadero
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Kuramata (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2-3w, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, dug in, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Tut's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Hazzard (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, let out 2-3w upper, to 2p near 1/8, up 1/16, gamely

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Runnymede Farm Inc. & Catesby W. Clay

ENTRY.NAME: Main Event
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Winfromwithin
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, let out 2w 1/4p, collared, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p, set down 3w upper, dug in, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Outer turf CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN OF THE MUD (IRE) went to the front, showed the way under pressure to her outside, vied along the rail on the turn, responded well when asked near the quarter-pole, shook clear into upper stretch and drew off under steady urging. MATERIAL WITNESS was rated just behind the leader on the inside, drafted along the rail on the turn, was asked at the quarter-pole, chased the winner in the stretch and earned the place. YOU ONLY LIVE ONCE was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, moved up under urging, went around the turn in the two path and got up for the show. NYXED was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch, came out near the three-sixteenths and bothered a rival then improved position. CATSKILL HUMOR was one of four to break a step slow, settled on the outside, went three then four wide on the turn and lacked the needed response. MADAKET'S ARROW settled off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path, moved out while put to a drive in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick. MILLIE JEAN pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the two to three path on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and came up empty. DREAMING OF MO broke a step slow, settled towards the rear, went two to three wide on the turn and was no factor. SEAWITCH was urged along towards the back, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. OOLONG HAI (IRE) tossed her head while tugging rankly on the bit coming to the nine-sixteenths, went three wide while let out on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and capitulated. ISOLA (IRE) bumped with a foe while off a step slow, settled in the back half of the field, went two then three wide on the turn, swung five wide into the stretch, checked off the heels of NYXED when that foe came out near the three-sixteenths and failed to respond. FANCY STAX bumped with an opponent while off a step slow, angled in at the back near the half-mile pole, saved ground on the turn and failed to impact. FOLLOWING THE FINISH, THE RIDER OF ISOLA REQUESTED A HOLD ON THE RACE. AFTER THE STEWARDS' REVIEW, NYXED WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FOURTH AND PLACED ELEVENTH FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH

ENTRY.NAME: Madaket's Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 2path turn, moved out 3/16, lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Seawitch
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, inside turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Material Witness
ENTRY.OWNER: Gasaway Brent and Twin Creeks Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,drafted rail turn,ask1/4,chased,no match,earned2nd

ENTRY.NAME: You Only Live Once
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,moved up,urged along,2path turn,along for show

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Nyxed
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,inside turn,4w1/4,came out3/16,bother foe,improved

ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC Kisber Michael E Deutsch Peter and The Elkstone Group LLC (Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,inside turn,asked1/4,drew off,steady urging

ENTRY.NAME: Oolong Hai (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head 4-1/2,rank,rated,3wide turn,mvd out,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Dreaming of Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,settled,2-3path turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Isola (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Calvert Chad RAP Racing and Grund David
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,off step slow,settled,2-3p turn,5p1/4,checked3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Stax
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,off step slow,angled in,inside turn,no factor

ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slw,settled outside,3-4wide turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Millie Jean
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,urged 2-3path turn,came up empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 95. Claiming Purse 55000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare A ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCCO STRONG six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn advancing on the front nearing the quarter pole, overhauled the top pair and swung five wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive and was geared down in the late stages. JUST CALL RAY chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. TWO THIRTY FIVE prompted the leader from the outside six to seven paths off the inside, tucked four wide into the turn advancing to duel with that rival, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. INVISIBLE WAR chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and improved position to procure the last major share. LIFE AND LIGHT five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went nine wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. BURGEE coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. SIX PERCENT chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. FORTY TWO ACE showed the way in hand five paths off the inside down the backstretch under some pressure to the outside, tucked three wide through the turn and dueled with TWO THIRTY FIVE coming under coaxing five-sixteenths from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. HANDSOME CAT coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired. MY FRIENDS BEER chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, got coaxed along three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: My Friends Beer
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables Acqua No
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 6-7w, dueled 4p 3/8, 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 5w turn, advanced, up 5w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 5p, dueled 3w turn, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Burgee
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Invisible War
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 2p 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Just Call Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Life and Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 9w upper, passed tired foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/8M Turf CR: 108. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim OtherwiseC laim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXACT ESTIMATE saved ground on the first turn, moved out entering the backstretch, was rated on the outside, ranged up three wide on the far turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead into upper stretch then kicked clear, remained clear under a drive into the final sixteenth and just held under strong urging. FREEDOM TRAIL traveled around the opening bend in the two path, settled on the outside, moved from the two path to the four path on the far turn, was roused five wide into the stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed fast to just miss. DAUNT bumped with a rival at the start, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was roused three then four wide on the far turn, chased the winner in the stretch and finished willingly for the show. FRANCESCO CLEMENTE (IRE) was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, went around the first turn in the two path, was reserved at the rear, raced two then three wide on the far turn, was roused five wide into the stretch then moved further out and improved position. TIDE OF THE SEA brushed with a rival after the start, went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked on the far turn, lost the lead under a drive into upper stretch and gave way. GOOD SKATE bumped with a rival at the start, was taken under a tight hold early, saved ground while reserved off the pace, moved to the two path near the five-sixteenths, came under a drive in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. RONSTADT was reserved on the inside, saved ground through the far turn, cut the corner behind a foe into the stretch, was roused near the three-sixteenths and failed to rally. ALTERNATE REALITY established a forward position early, went around the first turn in the two path, tracked the leader on the outside, chased in the two path on the far turn and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Exact Estimate
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,mvd out,rated,ranged up 3p2nd,lead3/16,clear,just held

ENTRY.NAME: Tide of the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed after brk,clear pace,inside,ask2nd turn,headed,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Good Skate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tight hold,ins1st,resrvd,ins-2p2nd,lackd needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Daunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,2p1st,settled,3-4p2nd,chased,willingly for show

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled outside,2-4p2nd turn,ask5w1/4,rallied,just missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside,asked 3/16,failed to rally

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,tracked outside,chased 2path 2nd turn,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. T hree Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of ClaimO therwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARIACHI coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking to the two path through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and continued just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive and held well and clear to the finish to prevail. ZEEBEAR four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. RADIO RED got bumped at the start by PERFECT MUNNINGS, who broke outwards, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing midway, swung three to four wide for home, kept on to procure the show honors. D'ONT LOSE CRUZ coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. BREW PUB five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, went seven wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. HORN OF PLENTY was leaning along the off side stall when the latch was sprung and brushed the gate to his right side getting away last and conceding three lengths to the front, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cornered three wide into upper stretch, weakened. BIG ENGINE bobbled at the break conceding two to three lengths to the front, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing midway, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. PERFECT MUNNINGS broke out at the start bumping RADIO RED, showed brief speed five wide down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn and faded, swung five wide into upper stretch and faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Horn of Plenty
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable Big Toe Stables LLC and Koshanostra Stables

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 76. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Clai m Will Be Void). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZAPRUDER bumped with a rival at the start, dropped from the four path to the two path on the first turn, settled towards the rear, went two then three wide around most of the far turn then angled five wide, came six wide into the stretch, rallied on the outside, closed well to get the lead outside the sixteenth-pole then moved clear under good handling to prevail. ATLANTA'S ACUNA angled in abruptly before the first turn, raced in the three path on that bend, contested the pace on the outside, was urged in the two path on the far turn, shook clear outside the five-sixteenths, remained clear under a drive into the final furlong but was overtaken while clear for the place. CHARMING JIM bumped hard with a rival at the start and was off slow, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, settled at the rear, went two then three wide on the far turn, swung six wide into the stretch, drifted in inside the furlong marker and improved for the show. SCREW LOOSE bumped soundly with a foe at the start, was taken up some while put in tight quarters before the first turn, saved ground while reserved off the pace, angled four wide late on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. PERFECT OUTCOME was reluctant to load, bumped with an opponent at the start, raced inside to the two path on the first turn, settled just off the pace, was asked while moving from the rail to the three path on the far turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and tired. FAST STUDY went three then two wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused while moving from the two path to the four path on the far turn and failed to rally. IMPAZIBLE PRINCE bumped with rivals on both sides at the start, angled in towards the rear, saved ground on the turns and was no factor. THATSMYBOXER broke in and bumped with a foe, was bumped hard before the first turn then taken up, went two to three wide on the turns and came up empty. MYLES stumbled badly at the start then bumped with an opponent, went five then four wide on the first turn, settled towards the rear, went three then two wide on the far turn and failed to respond. A LISTER was carried in on the opening straightaway then bumped hard with a rival and was taken up, went three to four wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, dropped back four then five wide on the far turn and capitulated. SOMAMA BEACH was hustled from the gate, contested the pace on the inside, dropped back nearing the five-sixteenths and faded. UTAMARO went around the first turn in the two path, was well placed just off the pace, came under pressure while two then three wide on the far turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Somama Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,dropped back 5/16,faded
